Question
========

Answerlist
----------
*  $\frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_i - 3)^2$

*  $\frac{1}{n-1} \sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_i - 3)^2$
*  $\frac{1}{n+1} \sum_{i=1}^{n}(X_i - 3)^2$
